title: Traits and Features
content: Abjuration Subclass Feature Each time you take a Short Rest, the intensity of your Arcane Ward increases by an amount equal to your Wizard level. Abjuration School Lvl 10 (Wizard Subclass) Empowered Evocation Subclass Feature Your grasp of Evocation magic has tightened, and you can add your Intelligence modifier to damage rolls with any Evocation spells.
